segment.source: Troubleshooting MED-V by Using the Administration Toolkit
segment.target: Troubleshooting MED-V by Using the Administration Toolkit

segment.source: Troubleshooting MED-V by Using the Administration Toolkit
segment.target: Troubleshooting MED-V by Using the Administration Toolkit

segment.source: Troubleshooting MED-V by Using the Administration Toolkit
segment.target: Troubleshooting MED-V by Using the Administration Toolkit

segment.source: Use the MED-V Administration Toolkit to troubleshoot certain problems in a MED-V workspace.
segment.target: Use the MED-V Administration Toolkit to troubleshoot certain problems in a MED-V workspace.

segment.source: The MED-V Administration Toolkit lets you access and configure event logs, restart or reset the MED-V workspace, and view the published applications and redirected web addresses in the MED-V workspace.
segment.target: The MED-V Administration Toolkit lets you access and configure event logs, restart or reset the MED-V workspace, and view the published applications and redirected web addresses in the MED-V workspace.

segment.source: You can also use the MED-V Administration Toolkit to open the MED-V workspace virtual machine in full-screen mode.
segment.target: You can also use the MED-V Administration Toolkit to open the MED-V workspace virtual machine in full-screen mode.

segment.source: To Open the MED-V Administration Toolkit
segment.target: To Open the MED-V Administration Toolkit

segment.source: Perform the following steps to open the MED-V Administration Toolkit:
segment.target: Perform the following steps to open the MED-V Administration Toolkit:

segment.source: On the host computer that contains the MED-V workspace you are troubleshooting, open a Command Prompt window.
segment.target: On the host computer that contains the MED-V workspace you are troubleshooting, open a Command Prompt window.

segment.source: Browse to %systemdrive%Program FilesMicrosoft Enterprise Desktop Virtualization.
segment.target: Browse to %systemdrive%Program FilesMicrosoft Enterprise Desktop Virtualization.

segment.source: At the command prompt, type MedvHost /toolkit.
segment.target: At the command prompt, type MedvHost /toolkit.

segment.source: After the MED-V Administration Toolkit opens, you can use the toolkit to help resolve issues in the MED-V workspace found during troubleshooting.
segment.target: After the MED-V Administration Toolkit opens, you can use the toolkit to help resolve issues in the MED-V workspace found during troubleshooting.

segment.source: In this Section
segment.target: In this Section

segment.source: Viewing and Configuring MED-V Logs
segment.target: Viewing and Configuring MED-V Logs

segment.source: Describes how to use the MED-V Administration Toolkit to collect and manage MED-V event logs in the host computer and the guest virtual machine.
segment.target: Describes how to use the MED-V Administration Toolkit to collect and manage MED-V event logs in the host computer and the guest virtual machine.

segment.source: Restarting and Resetting a MED-V Workspace
segment.target: Restarting and Resetting a MED-V Workspace

segment.source: Describes how to restart and reset MED-V workspaces by using the MED-V Administration Toolkit.
segment.target: Describes how to restart and reset MED-V workspaces by using the MED-V Administration Toolkit.

segment.source: Viewing MED-V Workspace Configurations
segment.target: Viewing MED-V Workspace Configurations

segment.source: Describes how to use the MED-V Administration Toolkit to view the published applications and redirected web addresses in a MED-V workspace and how to open the MED-V workspace virtual machine in full-screen mode.
segment.target: Describes how to use the MED-V Administration Toolkit to view the published applications and redirected web addresses in a MED-V workspace and how to open the MED-V workspace virtual machine in full-screen mode.
